div.p: A carry over from the TEI guidelines, the Anchored attribute is not specific to the work being carried out on the Orlando Project. Its purpose is to indicate whether or not a Note element is anchored in a source text that is being tagged. It contains values of "yes" (copy text indicates the place of attachment of the note) and "no" (copy text does not indicate the place of attachment for the note). In principle Note is available anywhere in the textbase, but do not use unless otherwise instructed.
